Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
I need Invoice PDFs for my accountant, I'm only able to Export a CSV under the daily ad cost.

To download reports in CSV format, you can use the 'Export' button once your report has successfully run. This option is available on the right-hand side of the page where you view your reports. For more detailed instructions, please refer to our Reporting Guide here: [Reporting Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18088532505485-Reporting-Guide). If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Yes I know but I need PDFs for credit card payments

Unfortunately, we currently only support exporting reports in CSV format. For specific invoice PDFs related to credit card payments, I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They should be able to assist you with your request for PDF invoices.
